name: Drive Mode
description: Settings for continuous shooting and self-timer

settings.name: Drive Mode
settings.description: Sets the drive mode such as continuous shooting or self-timer

settings.name: Bracket Type
settings.description: Sets the type of bracketing to perform

settings.name: Self-timer during Bracket
settings.description: Sets whether to use the self-timer during bracket shooting

settings.name: Bracket order
settings.description: Sets the shooting order for exposure bracketing

settings.name: Interval Shooting
settings.description: Sets whether to perform interval shooting

settings.name: Number of Shots
settings.description: Sets the number of images to be captured during interval shooting

settings.name: Shooting Interval
settings.description: Sets the shooting interval for interval shooting

settings.name: AE Tracking Sensitivity
settings.description: Sets the sensitivity of auto exposure tracking during interval shooting

settings.name: Pixel Shift Multi Shoot
settings.description: Settings for pixel shift multiple shooting

settings.name: Pixel Shift Multi Shooting
settings.description: Sets whether to perform pixel shift multi shooting

settings.name: Number of Shots
settings.description: Sets the number of images to capture in pixel shift mode

settings.name: Shooting Interval
settings.description: Sets the interval for pixel shift shooting
